data.message: i'm sorry i haven't forgot about u i haven't had internet and  wat i have nowis goin to expire in 20 25 mimnutes they r supposeto come fix my shit today so i will have opermanent wifi anyway i haven't been with anyone else 4 along time i'm tired of muchers and sorta waiting on tha one thts u but if u don';t want me ill live i got uyour gifts but my watch got stolen and tha silver part of my leather bracelet came off but i still have it and tha neckkklace my address is 1309 n 14th apt b lafayette ,in 47904 thank u so much for tha gifts i'll treasure them always i never forgot about you bnut rite now i hsave a big belly from watever med they have me on i got an appt wendsday to get off of it i  will do my best to keep in touch bye bye 4 now tina ops i'm tha rteal marilyn monroe only this time i get long blonde hair
